page.title: 06FARMING IN WITHYHAM/ST.JOHN
page.content: Friars Gate farm has 25{horses}but only 20 saddles. The prices for {lessons}and hacks is in the region of 5 pounds for 1 hour riding. They own a lot of land including a cross country course and an indoor nd outdoor riding school. They have one pony which works with the disabled children. He came second in the disabled show. His name is Crumpet; he was only two points behind the winner so he became relief disabled pony of the year. The people who help have to get uo at 6a.m. and have their lesson before it begins at 9a.m. A normal working day begins at 6 and ends at 7p.m. They have to wesr jodphurs and when they go out on display the{uniform}is black hat, blue shirt, navy blue jodphurs and black boots.
